Tips.Description1: Put it into a tigtly closed container.
Tips.Description2: Keep the container closed when it is not in use.

Tips.Description1: Do place sharps in a proper structure proof conatiner.
Tips.Description2: Do not pick broken glass by hand.
Tips.Description3: Keep medical waste out of reach of kids.

Tips.Description1: Donot overfill your health waste containers.
Tips.Description2: Dispose health waste when the container overfill.
